v-text

v-ifv-elsev-else-if
Visible when show is true
v-html
v-pre
{{ msg }} v-pre skips compile process
Applies on child elements
v-cloak
Cloaks the element until
Vue instance compilation is finished
You have to add style of 
[v-clock]
   display: none;
v-once
Only binds data once. (ex. Brand logos)
Optimizing performance
Applies on child elements
v-show
show property uses display:none;
Expensive on load, but cheap in toggle.
v-for (Object)
v-for has higher priority over v-if
  • {{ `${value} : ${key} : ${index}` }}
v-for (Array)
  • {{ `${index} : ${value}` }}: Only show is true
v-for (Number)
{{ i }}
v-for (String)
{{ s }}
v-for Nested
{{ i }} : {{ s }}
template
Add reactive data
